properties.General Description: Small open farm, square building made of large dressed blocks. An underground rock-cut water cistern has been identified in the south-west corner of the building.Relatively recent clearances have largely obscured the internal arrangements of the building. Cut marks that can be seen just south of the building clearly resulted from quarrying for building materials. At the far north-eastern end of the site are the remains of exiguous buildings covered with low scrub (Buzaian 2019, 412).
